title: Final Takeaways From the 'Last Dance' Finale
description:
After the final two episodes of 'The Last Dance' premiered Sunday night, Chris Ryan and Sean Fennessey break down the key takeaways and share their overall thoughts on the popular sports documentary. They talk about how a document like this could be made for modern players and what this doc does to Michael Jordan's legacy as a whole.
Hosts: Chris Ryan and Sean Fennessey

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
